page.title: 19Where Bradninch folk Work
page.content: These days, it seems that{Bradninch people are not so closely linked workwise with their town, apart from those who farm. Transport tends to be of the private variety and there is evidence of shopping outside of Bradninch. This has a large effect on the local{trader. We have conducted our own survey of where parents of Bradninch children work. It is apparent that more mothers have part_time work and this may well be in Bradninch. However, out of a sample of 41, 18 work in Bradninch, 9 travel to Exeter, 2 to Silverton, 5 to Hele, 1 to Dulford, 1 to Tiverton, 1 to Cullompton, 1 to Taunton, 1 to Killerton, 1 to Whimple and 1 travels to various places. The cottage industries of our town have been mentioned.
